title: reminder of how Mordekaiser used to be broken
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=92MBZVDcCDY
http://orig10.deviantart.net/1a0a/f/2011/218/9/1/mordekaiser_in_a_nutshell_by_melonskin-d45o2yk.gif

if you didn't understand, np: dat  E and R range

rip magekaiser

replies.body:
inb4 mord mains whining about his rework. Seriously, they are the new vegans.
EDIT: when the mord mains downvote you

> inb4 mord mains whining about his rework. Seriously, they are the new vegans.

Turns a joke into an insult in a place where most people like the specific morde mains you're insulting.
I don't think the Morde mains are the ones downvoting you buddy.

Plot twist.
I'm a vegan, crossfitting Morde main!

Are you an engineer though?
And do you vape?
_Opens 9Gag for more_
Do you have a girlfriend?
And are you atheist?

I suck at math, so I won't be a good engineer...
I do not vape, nor do I smoke...

I have an ex...Thanks for reminding me, ffs...
I am an atheist though...

Verdict; I'm not as hipster as I thought I were.

Well played. Your Undine has trumped my Papyrus. HOWEVER!! YOU JUST TRIGGERED MY TRAP CARD!

http://pm1.narvii.com/6010/4d484201b36f696cd119058af4f26596e7e634c4_hq.jpg

>
> Turns a joke into an insult in a place where most people like the specific morde mains you're insulting.
> I don't think the Morde mains are the ones downvoting you buddy.

Yea they are lmfao
That rework could've been done to any other champion, and you wouldn't have liked it either if it was your main.

> [{quoted}](name=Moraru Maurice,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=U9o4NQOe,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-08-07T16:48:09.787+0000)
>
> That rework could've been done to any other champion, and you wouldn't have liked it either if it was your main.

Yes. Imagine if the ADC reworked changed vayne's 3-hit to Morde' current 3-hit.

They could thematically justify it too :/

i managed to understand that you have to take a ghost of tryndamere.

but now trynd sucks and none plays him lel

I got a penta kill on him last week.  Enemy didnt see the threat until too late.  Bot lane got ganked so i counterganked took out lee sin going for the adc under our turret then we 3 reengaged on the bot lane duo. They killed my adc i got a doublekill both mids came down and enemy top tpd in killed mid was almost dead lulu turned toplaner into a bunny so i could close to melee and. Boom penta.  

Just an FYI i didnt beg for the penta after the quadra. Pentas are earned not given

That time I went adc {{champion:1}}  on ARAM, trashed the enemy team... then got ulted by {{champion:82}} and made an enemy comeback.

{{champion:10}} WHY! WHY WOULD YOU DO THAT! WHY WOULD YOU MAKE ANNIE GHOST A THREAT!
{{champion:1}} Well, as far as I'm concerned, I won twice, so...
{{champion:25}} \*fistbumps annie\*
Morde can still get pentakills. Admittedly, the guy playing Morde was quite surprised at the time, but it was a penta nonetheless.
